name: Across the Void (itch)
description:
Your are on a mission to Ganymede when your ship is struck by micro meteors.  You were the only one to survive.  Gather what you need to make it back to earth and get in the life pod.

WASD/Arrows to move

Spacebar/E to interact, hold to hold onto part crates

Interact with gas canisters to get more O2

Interact with the suit dock to get more propellant for your jets

If you run out of O2 you die

The plan was to include asteroids moving around that you would have to shoot, but didn't get to that.  So the mix of themes would have been survival + asteroids.
